news.headline: Ladder Capital Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
news.article_text:
Ladder Capital NYSE: LADR executives used the company’s fourth-quarter 2025 earnings call to highlight a year they characterized as a turning point, marked by the attainment of investment-grade credit ratings and a renewed emphasis on growing the loan portfolio and earnings in 2026.

Fourth-quarter and full-year results

news.headline: IREN's Q2 Loss Wider Than Expected, Revenues Decline Q/Q
news.article_text:
IREN Limited’s IREN second-quarter fiscal 2026 loss of 44 cents per share came in wider than the Zacks Consensus Estimate pegged at a loss of 9 cents per share. The company reported earnings of 9 cents per share in the year-ago quarter.



IREN reported a net loss of $155.4 million against a net income of $384.6 million in the previous quarter.



Total revenues decreased 23.1% sequentially to $184.7 million, missing the consensus estimate by 16.49%.



IREN’s shares have gained 5.4% year to dat

news.summary: Anthropic introduces its new Claude Opus 4.6 model as a way to conduct research and build spreadsheets.

news.headline: ON Semiconductor Balances Stable Credit Outlook With US$6b Buyback Plan
news.article_text:
Never miss an important update on your stock portfolio and cut through the noise. Over 7 million investors trust Simply Wall St to stay informed where it matters for FREE.

Moody’s revised ON Semiconductor’s (NasdaqGS:ON) credit outlook from positive to stable.

The company’s board approved a share repurchase program of up to US$6b.

Both actions point to a shift in how the company is balancing its capital structure and shareholder returns.

news.headline: Moody’s Expands Risk Tools As Private Credit Scrutiny And Valuation Questions Grow
news.article_text:
Get insights on thousands of stocks from the global community of over 7 million individual investors at Simply Wall St.

Moody's (NYSE:MCO) recently acquired Numerated Growth Technologies to expand its lending technology capabilities.

The company also acquired CAPE Analytics, adding advanced property and insurance risk modeling tools to its platform.

These deals come as the private credit market, now around $2tn in size, faces increased regulatory scrutiny.

buys.why: Below slow SMA • Oversold • Bearish MACD
buys.news_summary: Growth fears rattled Wall Street on Thursday, with signs of weakening in the labor market sparking another day of steep stock-market declines.  Stocks fell widely after a trio of reports from both government and private sources showed unexpectedly low job openings for December, surprisingly high claims for unemployment insurance last week and a sharp uptick in corporate job cuts last month.  Declines were particularly acute in stocks tied to consumer discretionary spending.

news.headline: DoorDash Taps 50 Cent And Dining Rewards As Shares Lag Targets
news.article_text:
Make better investment decisions with Simply Wall St's easy, visual tools that give you a competitive edge.

DoorDash has partnered with Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson for "The Big Beef" cultural campaign around the Big Game.

The company is promoting its delivery offerings through content tied to the event and 50 Cent's brand.

DoorDash is also expanding its Going Out rewards program ahead of Valentine’s Day.

The updated program includes special perks and in app reservations at a range of restaurant

news.headline: A Key Takeaway From Earnings Season: Signs of Consumer Weakness
news.summary: Earnings season is more than halfway over, and a clear laggard is emerging: companies that sell non-essential items to consumers.  A high ratio of companies—38%—have also missed consensus earnings forecasts.  The sector covers a broad swathe of the economy, encompassing a range of companies from Amazon and DoorDash to Tractor Supply and Marriott.

news.headline: Growth Scare Hits Markets Edgy From Tech Selloff
news.summary: Growth fears rattled Wall Street on Thursday, with signs of weakening in the labor market sparking another day of steep stock-market declines.  Stocks fell widely after a trio of reports from both government and private sources showed unexpectedly low job openings for December, surprisingly high claims for unemployment insurance last week and a sharp uptick in corporate job cuts last month.  Declines were particularly acute in stocks tied to consumer discretionary spending.

news.headline: DoorDash, Inc. (DASH)’s Buy Rating Upheld as Investments Signal Long-Term Growth Potential
news.article_text:
We recently published an article titled 12 High Growth E-commerce Stocks To Buy.

On January 29, Guggenheim lowered its price target on DoorDash, Inc. (NASDAQ:DASH) to $275 from $280 while reiterating a Buy rating ahead of the company’s Q4 earnings report scheduled for February 18. The modest reduction reflects expectations that elevated investment spending will continue to weigh on margins into 2027. However, the maintained Buy rating underscores confidence that these investments are strategic
